name: Trick or Meat
description:
Trick or M E A T

Welcome to my HALLOWEEN HOME! Grab as much candy as you want! Just click and drag. Stop whenever you like, but don't forget to go down the street and try the other houses! 

Click and drag to interact. Get as much candy as you want!

Liz Gravis
Eric Grossman
Evangelina Hsu
Sam Leeke
Tyler Tomaseski

Assets used: 

Haunted PSX Shader Pipeline

Character photos from wikimedia commons

Made for Society of Play's Trick or Treat Jam!
